com.redhat.rhn.common.util

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.util.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple file utilities to read/write strings to a file on disk.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getTailOfFile(java.lang.String pathToFile, java.lang.Integer lines)
      Reads and returns the last n lines from a given file as string.
      static byte[] readByteArrayFromFile(java.io.File fileToRead, long start, long end)
      Read a file off disk into a byte array with specified range This can use lots of memory if you read a large file

      Read a file off disk into a String and return it.

    • Method Detail

      • writeStringToFile

        public static void writeStringToFile(java.lang.String contents,
                     java.lang.String path)
        Save a String to a file on disk using specified path. WARNING: This deletes the original file before it writes.
        Parameters:
        contents - to save to file on disk
        path - to save file to.

      • readStringFromFile

        public static java.lang.String readStringFromFile(java.lang.String path)
        Read a file off disk into a String and return it. Expect weird stuff if the file is not textual.
        Parameters:
        path - of file to read in
        Returns:
        String containing file.

      • readByteArrayFromFile

        public static byte[] readByteArrayFromFile(java.io.File fileToRead,
                           long start,
                           long end)
        Read a file off disk into a byte array with specified range This can use lots of memory if you read a large file
        Parameters:
        fileToRead - File to read part of into byte array
        start - index of read
        end - index of read
        Returns:
        byte[] array from file.

      • getTailOfFile

        public static java.lang.String getTailOfFile(java.lang.String pathToFile,
                             java.lang.Integer lines)
        Reads and returns the last n lines from a given file as string.
        Parameters:
        pathToFile - path to file
        lines - size of the tail
        Returns:
        tail of file as string
